text: Adriana Rebeca Vieyra Olivares (born 24 August 1961) is a Mexican politician from the National Action Party. From 2006 to 2009 she served as Deputy of the LX Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Morelos. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:People from Morelos Category:Women members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians Category:21st-century Mexican women politicians
title: Adriana Vieyra Olivares
